page.title: 14LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN BURY
page.content: Central Bury has two main leisure facilities - { {Bury Athletics Club -}It is just over 100 years old and provides facilities for young boys and girls to train for various events. Some of its members have succeeded in being included in many important sporting events such as the{Olympics}and{Commonwealth Games. Time is also given to helping children with different handicaps. { {Castle Leisure Centre -}This Centre was opened in 1976, and provides many indoor sports - badminton, squash, weight-lifting etc. Tere are swimming baths, saunas, and a solarium. Provision is made for galas, tournaments, and exhibitions, some on a national level. B.G.S. ( Girls ) Prep
